attr.title: Super Dungeon Muncher
attr.desc: Super Dungeon Muncher combines puzzles and rogue-like action with a unique twist. The Muncher chases you in real time as you progress through the world. Act fast and think quick or the Muncher will get you. TATE mode is supported as of game version 1.4.
attr.desc_md: **Super Dungeon Muncher** combines the thrill of **puzzle-solving** with the intense challenge of **rogue-like action**â€”all with a unique twist. As you journey through the world, the relentless *Muncher** will chase you in real time. Every second counts: **act fast** and **think quickly**, or risk being caught by the **Muncher**. TATE mode is supported as of game version 1.4.
attr.inst: Download the game and extract it. Put the data.win from the extracted folder into your ports/superdungeonmuncher folder.
attr.inst_md: 1. [Download the game](https://n-nexy.itch.io/super-dungeon-muncher) and extract it. 2. Move the `data.win` and `options.ini` files from the extracted folder to your `ports/superdungeonmuncher/gamedata` folder.
